body.name: Pipishell Tilting TV Wall Mount - Adjustable for 37-82 inch TVs up to 132 lbs, Low Profile with Pull Cords, Sturdy Bracket for Flat or Curved TVs, Max VESA 600x400mm
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35

features: Wide Compatibility: This tilting TV wall mount by Pipishell fits most 37″–82″ TVs up to 132 lbs with VESA mounting patterns 200x100 to 600x400mm. Please verify the size, weight, and VESA mounting pattern of your TV before purchase.

Built for Stability: Engineered with reinforced, cold rolled steel, our TV wall mount features a remarkable weight capacity of 132 lbs. The TV wall mount bracket has been tested to support 4 times the rated weight capacity, ensuring ultimate peace of mind for your equipment.

Adjustable Pull Cords: The tilting TV wall mount is designed with convenient pull cord locking mechanisms that allow you to easily lock or release your TV from the wall plate. The adjustable 6.9″–13.8″ length makes it easy to hide the cords behind the TV while still making them accessible.

Low Profile Look: This TV wall mount positions your TV only 1.5″ from the wall for a sleek, low-profile look. The 10° adjustable tilt angle helps to reduce screen glare from windows and other light sources for an optimal viewing experience.

Hassle-Free Installation: Installing this TV wall mount bracket is a breeze thanks to detailed instructions and the included mounting hardware. The tilting TV wall mount can be installed on 16″–24″ wood studs, solid concrete, and brick walls. Please do not mount on drywall alone.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Pipishell Tilting TV Wall Mount | Streamline Your Entertainment Space Elevate your TV viewing experience with the PILT7 tilting TV wall mount by Pipishell. Designed to streamline your entertainment space while adding functionality, this TV mount is the perfect solution to mount your TV with ease.

This Pipishell TV wall mount bracket is a great choice for any space. Whether you need to mount your TV in the living room, bedroom, or office, the TV mount is designed to blend seamlessly into your room. Enjoy improved viewing comfort and a more immersive viewing experience.

Previous page Next page The tilting TV wall mount fits most 37″–82″ TVs up to 132lbs with VESA patterns 200x100 to 600x400mm. The TV mount can be installed on 16″–24″ wood studs, solid concrete, or brick walls.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars very sturdy product
reviews.reviewText: this product is very easy to install and is very sturdy. we hung a 65-inch big screen on it and have not had any issues. very well made. will for sure recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great inexpensive Wall Mount
reviews.reviewText: This mount is great for someone who just wants a basic wall mount to put their TV on. I have become a pro at having TVS over the last few years and this mount did not disappoint. It is easy to assemble and comes with options for every TV to mount it perfectly on your wall. This mount is very inexpensive but it is everything you could need for a flush mount for your tv. Don't break the bank for a mount that will do the same thing for 2-3x the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not bad but could be better
reviews.reviewText: The instructions were really good and covered everything. The pieces included were all useful and organized well.The wall hanging portion seemed to be pretty bent almost at a slant from the manufacturer so I had to bend it slightly and angle the hang a bit more to one direction. Other than that pretty solid buy especially for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It's a good mount. Sturdy and seemingly easy for husband to install. Would reccomend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Mount not fitting TV
reviews.reviewText: Did not fit tv 55inch as stated in description. Company made good on our purchase. They offered a refund or replacement of the mount. We declined both as we can use it on another smaller TV. Thank you to the quick response. I would highly recommend this company .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Adjustable straps are ridiculous!
reviews.reviewText: Mounting to the wall is fairly easy with this TV mount. The issue is that it’s aesthetically, Ridiculous! Why would we want straps hanging inches below the TV? In the picture, you can see that I had tried to tape the straps behind the TV. After a few days, they eventually fall.Who thought this would be a good idea? once the TV is hung, there’s no need for the straps anyway. They cannot be used to till the TV once the TV has been installed so I don’t get why the straps are there at all.I stuck a command hook behind the TV thinking I could get both straps to hang on it to hide them, but and it’s impossible because you can’t reach your fingers/hand behind the TV to get them on the hook after the TV has been hung.Spend the extra money and get a different mount that doesn’t have the straps!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good for value
reviews.reviewText: Nice and durable product. With great value

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to adjust
reviews.reviewText: Easy to install. Able to disconnect and reconnect cable easily. The way it unlocked for removal’s works great
